word:
I shall now say farewell. I will try to be more faithful than I have been in writing to you. Be of good courage, dear sister. I believe I shall meet you when our warfare is accomplished. May the Lord bless you and keep you and sanctify you to Himself. I wish I could see Ellen and talk with her.--Letter 112, 1906. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. April 11, 1985 


                                     -263-
